content: रोचन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ना|नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [रुच्-ल्यु रोचयति वा ल्यु] {@--1@} Enlightening, illuminating, irradiating. {@--2@} Bright, splendid, beautiful, lovely, pleasing, agreeable; <ls>Bk. 6. 73.</ls> {@--3@} Stomachic. --नः {@--1@} A stomachic. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the five arrows of Cupid. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of several plants: --पलांडु, आरग्वध, दाडिम करंज, अंकोष्ठ &c. --नं {@--1@} Raising a desire for. {@--2@} The bright sky, firmament.
